alert.note: Alert for Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 24 at 11:02PM CDT until June 25 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 409 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 3 AM CDT SATURDAY FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN MINNESOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MINNESOTA WADENA IN NORTH CENTRAL MINNESOTA BELTRAMI HUBBARD LAKE OF THE WOODS IN NORTHWEST MINNESOTA BECKER CLEARWATER MAHNOMEN IN WEST CENTRAL MINNESOTA CLAY GRANT OTTER TAIL WILKIN IN NORTH DAKOTA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST NORTH DAKOTA RICHLAND THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ASHBY, BAGLEY, BARRETT, BAUDETTE, BEMIDJI, BRECKENRIDGE, CLEARBROOK, DETROIT LAKES, ELBOW LAKE, FERGUS FALLS, HERMAN, HOFFMAN, MAHNOMEN, MENAHGA, MOORHEAD, NAYTAHWAUSH, PARK RAPIDS, WADENA, WAHPETON, AND WAUBUN.
